summary: Vermith is a dark elf healer without scripts available in CBBE & UUNP body styles; with or without armor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#9900ff][size=6][b]Vermith
[/b][/size][/color]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/6ulvc6zyf/20170111021908_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Vermith
Race:  Custom Dark Elf
Voice:  Female Dark Elf
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.00
Weight:  52
Body Options:  Base CBBE & Custom UUNP
Skin:  Demoniac
Armor:  Profane Cleric Mashup
Weapons:  Ebony Dagger, Bow & Arrows
Spells:  Flames, Sparks, Ice Storm, Lightning Bolt, Vanilla & Custom Healing
Staff:  Healing Staff
Location:  Alchemist Camp - Outside Ivarstead
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/idc5x2hs7/Shack_Location.jpg[/img]

Levels with player.  Dark Elf Traits/Bonuses
Skills/Perk Trees:  Light Armor, Sneak, Illusion, Destruction, Alteration, Conjuration, Restoration

Tested with EFF & AFT
ENBs in Screenshots:  Vividian & RealVision

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/lf2y70ux3/20170111023352_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/p0jq1tk3r/Requirements.png[/img]
[b][u]Custom UUNP With & Without Armor[/u][/b]

HDT Physics
HDT Compatible Skeleton

[b][u]Base CBBE No Armor Versions[/u][/b]

None Known At This Time

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x4ru6k6iv/Recommended.png[/img]
Modified Skeleton such as XPMSE[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]
Facelight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/qn8xn1w5j/KnownIssues.png[/img]
[/url]Some ENBs may show slight skin discoloration between body and head

Armor may clip during some poses/animations

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/t93jsf2pz/20170111220155_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/fz56o7m6f/Installation.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x7bptea6f/Uninstall.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/cuuirf5dz/Many_Thanks_To.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile
[/url][url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/218944591881610/]Skyrim Mods & Modders[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/1273841859340346/]Children of Akatosh[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/bethesdamods/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/SkyrimModsFollowerHoarders/]Skyrim Mods Follower Hoarders[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5973055/?]DragonStar99[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/70kof7h1j/Q&A.png[/img]

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  My apologies, I no longer release my personal presets.

Q:  What armor can be put on the UUNP version?
A:  SeveNBase armors will work just fine with Vermith.
A:  Vermith's body is just a tweaked SeveNBase preset.

Q:  Why is she inconsistent and/or delayed in her healing
A:  Vermith doesn't use any scripting or quests for her healing abilities,
therefore results will vary depending on your setup & battle situation

Q:  Where did you get the idea for the no script healing?
A:  There are many healing related mods/followers that I referred to...
including but not limited to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33002/?]Follower LIve Package[/url] &  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66091/?]Millepon Healer Follower[/url]

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/vupfdrnd3/CreditsResources.png[/img]

TES5Edit

*If I forgot anyone; please kindly remind me.  Thank You*

This follower is the combination of the work of others.  Please obtain their permissions in addition to mine.
